# Copilot Instructions for test-ecommerce-suite Frontend (HTML)

This is the HTML/CSS/JS frontend repository for test-ecommerce-suite.

## Tech Stack

- HTML5
- CSS3 with custom properties
- Vanilla JavaScript (ES6+)
- Vite for bundling

## Available Agents

| Agent | Purpose |
|-------|---------|
| `@html` | Page and component development |
| `@testing` | Writing tests |
| `@a11y` | Accessibility compliance |

## Commands

```bash
npm run dev      # Start dev server
npm run build    # Build for production
npm run preview  # Preview production build
npm run e2e      # Run E2E tests
```
